name: Red Plum, White Nectarine and Blue Cheese Pizza
author: Anonymous
summary: Grilled fresh pizza rounds are topped with succulent slices of red plum and nectarine, then drizzled with a white balsamic and honey dressing, and dressed with blue cheese and walnuts.
ingredients: 1 large white California nectarine or peach, pitted
directions: Divide pizza dough into 4 equal pieces
Roll each out on a lightly floured board to make 6-inch circles
Place dough circles on a baking sheet and brush both sides with oil
Transfer dough circles to grill and cook over medium heat for a few minutes on each side until dough is cooked through and lightly marked by the grill
Cut each piece of fruit into 8 slices
Cook on a well-oiled grill for a few minutes on each side to lightly char
Remove from grill and arrange fruit on pizza crusts
Stir together balsamic vinegar and honey and drizzle over fruit
Sprinkle with blue cheese and walnuts; place pizzas back on grill, cover with lid and cook for a few minutes more to melt cheese
